title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.142 - Fresh beef sausage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.142 - Fresh beef sausage

State Regulations

Fresh Beef Sausage is sausage prepared with fresh beef
or frozen beef, or both, not including beef by-products, and may be seasoned
with condimental substances as permitted under Part 318 of this Article. The
finished product shall not contain more than 30 percent fat. To facilitate
chopping or mixing, water or ice may be used in an amount not to exceed three
percent of the total ingredients used. Notes

319.142

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
